website_summaries.verdict: This screen's high mesh count really keeps the grease contained. Be careful not to melt the plastic handle, though.
pros: Constructed from fine mesh,  304 stainless steel
Resting feet keep your counter clean and keep screen from sliding off pan
cons: Heat may cause the handle to warp
It's not always clear which side faces up, which can make a mess on the counter

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This is What the product looked like after my first 5 minutes of use. It may cut down on grease splatter but only minimally. Update: Apparently I had this upside down the first time I used it; I didn’t realize one side was a different mesh than the other side. When I made this change, it definitely cut down on the grease splatter. Still doesn’t eliminate it, but it definitely minimizes it. Perhaps the packaging should make it clearer, like “This side down” or something. Changed my rating to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I am returning. The size is described as 10 inches but it measure only 9.5 inches. It will not stay on top of a 10 inch pan. see my photo, IF it had fit I think it would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Valuegal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a kitchen aid one that is 13 inch and needed a smaller ones for my smaller frying pan, it was more expensive than I thought it would be but still decided to buy it. Does not splatter at all it works great, but don’t use it on smaller pan because it will discolor it. Would buy this brand again, the people who says it does not work is because they have the side up the side that has the metal is the one that should be up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Product is a God Send for my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Grease Splatter Screen recently, and I like it! It keeps all the oil in the pan instead of on the stove and my arms/hands. We cook chicken, Turkey, beef, salmon all with Mediterranean Oil and it can get messy pretty fast! But this stops the oil/grease from popping! I wish I would have bought this sooner i have some minor burns on my wrist and hands. If you have doubts about buying this, dont worry it's also easy to clean I just wash everything by hand It's very easy to clean. Protects the cook and the kitchen from burns and mess whats not to like.
customer_reviews.author: JBS_andKids

customer_reviews.title: very good splatter screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice splatter screen. I needed one for my 12" fry pan and this does the job. As noted in some reviews: the FLAT side goes over the pan, the "feet" are for placing it on a counter. Its heat resistant (but I DO NOT have flames going around my pan, if you do that it may char a bit) . its easily cleaned with a dish washing brush. I think you the edges around the sides need a good bruising to prevent oil build up over time. I usually brush mine off when finished cooking and its sill warm from use. I am very happy with the product and would buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf1961

customer_reviews.title: Best splatter screen I've ever used..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It's actually a bit heavier than I thought it would be.....not cheaply built. It sure is alot better than our older screen...We have a glass top stove and this screen has tremendously cut down on the splatter from frying foods. Sure makes cleanup easier! Trouble free purchase.... arrived quickly, packaged well,no damage.....wish all my purchases went this smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I have used the cheap $3 type and they don't last very long. This spatter screen is much heaver quality with a sturdy ring. I like the bars across the screen as it lets you sit it down without having grease on the counter. It works best by putting it on the skillet with the bar up so you can flip it over when you need to sit it off of the pan and have clean resting legs. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E.

customer_reviews.title: plastic handle melts
customer_reviews.text: The plastic handle melted on the side my pan, it was at medium-low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product: Inaccurate Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the splatter screen feels fantastic. The only reason I am drawing attention to this product with a 3 star review is the sizing description is off. I have multiple 10 inch pans, and this screen falls into the pan with each of them. It appears to be made for an 8 inch pan, not a 10 inch. I bought the 13 inch as well and this fits well over my 10 inch pans. Just a word of caution. The quality feels outstanding, just the sizing description is slightly misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Unabashedly Honest

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, only touch the handle!
customer_reviews.text: Welp I waited to write this review to ensure I could get good use out of this splatter guard. Today is the day. This. Is. Crap. It burned the first time I used it, so, it will never look clean.. Splatter wise, I say 80% of splatter-ness is "guarded". However, the rest of it goes everywhere. Today though.. Today it goes in the trash. Went to clean it.. One of the metal wires has sprung lose (you cant see it unless your using your fingers) poked a hole in my thumb, blood included, was not on the menu.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda HugNKiss

customer_reviews.title: Still Plenty of Splatter
customer_reviews.text: Affordable product, but considering they advertise that it can catch "99%" of grease simply is not true. Excited to use this product, but when I stated using it I noticed grease all around my stove. My intel thought was that I spattered some grease when I put my wings in, or perhaps I didn’t secure the splatter guard on right. I made sure the guard was on and I cleaned the area. 5 minutes later I checked again, and there was a still a substantial amount of splatter. I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peptobismol165

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - USE Coupon!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST splatter screen ever! I ordered the large one first and loved it. Included with the package was a %off coupon for additional purchases, but did I remember to use it for the two additional smaller screen purchases? No..... So remember to use it. These splatter screens are super sturdy and much better than the cheap ones at the big box stores. Plus, the mesh is great as the entire product is made of stainless steel. I don't think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I like that fact that this is not only stainless steel, but, that it is able to fit even on my largest frying pan. It does a great job of avoiding a big splatter mess on my stove and surrounding countertops. I put the spatter screen though the dishwasher when it arrived and I had no problem with it there. I used it the next morning for breakfast on my largest frying pan. It totally covered the entire pan and it stopped 99% of the grease splatters. .
customer_reviews.author: BabyDoll

customer_reviews.title: First Impression #1
customer_reviews.text: Over the years have been using local bargain outlets for basic $ screens which are replace 2 - 3 X a year. The size is 10" and did not adequately cover the larger pans used for frying. This screen was recently used for the first time and while 13" covered almost the entire electric frying pan. Did not realize that the 12" pan while square had curved corners and the screen was short in this area. Not the screen issue. Overall impressed with the build quality, screen restriction of grease and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: chw

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to clean right after use to avoid buildup and discoloration
customer_reviews.text: Works great for containing most splatters so stovetop cleanup is reduced. No screen will prevent splatters 100% but this one does a nice job. Cleanup is easy if done right after use and with a good grease cutting detergent like Dawn. I like the "feet" on the one side so that it does not sit directly on the counter when removed from the pan but be sure to have something covering your counter where yo place it as it will drip. Nice product, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and craftsmanship. Is backed by a Life Time warranty so that speaks for the quality of the product. Large size and works great! This is an update: Still doing a great job at keeping grease in its place... Read some of the lower reviews and is obvious that it is impossible to make everyone happy. The screen in this unit is as compact as can be. Other than using a solid lid it will be unrealistic to expect it to block all grease. Especially if frying food that tends to shoot grease at high speed. It does its job, just imagine not using it and the mess that one would have to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Munoz

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grease splatter screen. I used it wrong the first couple of times...but found out you put the mesh side down on the pan ( otherwise grease splatters all over the stove) and when done, turn it over to rest on its feet on the counter. Once I did that....it worked perfectly. Glad I bought it!!! It even fits in my drawer easier. Before this screen, I had one that the handle would fold up. But folding the handle up caused it to need more space in the drawer. This one does a better job plus it fits better as its flat !!! Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mg0569

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to not have to completely scrub down my cabinets and stove after making bacon. Easy to clean if you get after it right away. I wouldn’t suggest letting this one sit overnight. I would buy the largest option. As a larger screen can fit on a smaller pan. But a smaller screen can’t hit on a larger pan. Well made. A kitchen must-have. I hope this review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and fits my big pans
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large frying pans, 14" & 15", and finally have a spatter screen that fits them. Previously, I overlapped 2 of the 12" that were the biggest that typical stores had, including the store I bought the 15" pan at-go figure. Very nice to have a single screen to do the job. Very solid construction, a bit pricy, but should last for a long time. I deducted 1 star on easy to clean, since I have never considered spatter screens to be "easy" to clean-by their nature, screens get grease caught in the mesh, entire purpose, right? Still a lot easier than cleaning it off the stove top & entire surrounding area though. Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: customer-x

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Product is defective with exposed wire ends on edge of screen. This resulted on several puncture wounds to my finger tips that were both painful and bloody. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: bmore

customer_reviews.title: No Splatters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this splatter screen to fit over my 12 inch cast iron skillet. I really like the handles on it. They don't get hot. So far I haven't gotten splattered once when frying chicken. I haven't had it long enough to test for anything else, but if I don't get splattered when frying chicken, then I would say it works wonderfully! It cleans up really easy. I didn't put it in the dishwasher. I washed it by hand. The splatter screen appears to be well made. I will update if I find flaws or it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: What is up with this...can't clean it?
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a grease spatter shield, but unlike the last one (different brand) I had, I can't get it clean. Every time I use it, there is a large brown mark on the screen, and it will not come off. I've only used it a few times and it looks like it's filthy. I'll keep using it because it works, but won't buy another from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: C. FIELD

customer_reviews.title: Well designed & built
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Bought it because the material used is stainless steel. The mesh is tight so their claim of 97% should easily be accomplishable. The fork running thru the hoop has bumps to keep the splatter screen from sliding of the pan - another thoughtful part of their design. Like the plastic handle design because it will keep the user from encountering hot metal from the grease (or other hot material you may want to guard against). The screen is 13" in diameter so not particularly suited to small plan it is design more for large frying pans.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Fillmann

customer_reviews.title: Beware where you place the screen, don't let the black plastic part melt on your pan.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is nice and reinforced, but the black piece you see in the picture is made of plastic. When it comes into contact with a hot pan, it will melt and leave a plastic residue on the rim (if you are lucky), or in your cooking. Be careful where you place the screen to make sure the plastic doesn't touch any hot parts. This is a design flaw. Why have plastic parts on something that will be used with a hot pan?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant as you might think
customer_reviews.text: The product has a frame that is not supposed to rest on the pan. When one puts the screen on a pan it will discolor from the heat generated by the pan. Customer service says that this is due to gas heating that can make the pan hotter, presumably more than electric heat. It was also suggested that some scrubbing usually will help--it doesn't, however. Also, it doesn't eliminate all the spatters. A sturdy screen that leaves much to be desired, I would probably not purchase it again. I would suggest a cheaper version that one can discard once it is not servicable.
customer_reviews.author: seasoned invester

customer_reviews.title: Prevents oil splatter!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - prevents oil splatter and lets all the steam out so your food doesn't steam while it cooks! - I love the feet that allow me to rest this on the counter without it getting oily and dirty - pretty easy to clean, just use a dishrag and soap water to clean the mesh face - made of really quality material, hefty and sturdy. Cons: - not much
customer_reviews.author: spaceballadTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Medium Frying Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and did the job right! Now I wouldn’t get as much burns from the cooking oil when my family requests fried “Bangus /Milk Fish”! My only complaint was the price and the size! I wish it was cheaper and bigger. It only fit a medium size pan and my family does fry a lot . They usually use a bigger frying pan. It’s a bummer that the size was not as big I was expecting to be. Still happy and would still recommend only for a medium size frying pan! Ty amazon and seller !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy and well made.  Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Unlike my old splatter screens, this one is constructed with 2 metal "bars" from the handle out to the top in a "fan" shape. The handle is shorter than my old ones, which I thought would be an issue; it is not as the grip is good and isn't so long as to cause tipping. The fan shaped bars have ridges towards the top which help to hold it against the frying pan. Again, a great addition to the screen through innovation. The screen mesh is thicker than my old ones so hopefully won't tear as easily. All-in-all, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Maarten

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, it works great. The handle does not get hot at all, and compared to my very old splatter screen, this one prevents most of the splatter when frying. The only thing that I don't like is having to create an account to register the product with the manufacturer for the life-time warranty. Not sure if there's a better way they can do this, but I don't like having tons of accounts to keep track of, that I most likely won't use very often. Needless to say I didn't register the product....That's the only thing I didn't care for. Otherwise it's an excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: Pecking Girl

customer_reviews.title: Well made screen
customer_reviews.text: The splatter screen eliminates most 'Hot oil" from coming through and fits nicely over most of our frying pans. The best feature is strength. Vigorous scrubbing with a sponge of soft brush does no damage to the screen, making it possible to thoroughly clean. Sometimes we even toss it into the dishwasher. Definitely recommend this and will probably buy the larger screen s well.
customer_reviews.author: James Brook

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could love a splatter screen but I've found my heart with this one! Not only does it do a fantastic job at containing grease while frying and in turn keeps the grease from getting on me but it looks great doing it! I love how solid it feels in my hand unlike many of the cheapy versions where the screen separates from the frame if you breathe on it wrong. Plus it's got a Lifetime Warranty. It was on sale when I bought it but I would have gladly paid full price knowing what I do about it now. It will be the last splatter screen you ever buy! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Boxermom3

customer_reviews.title: Spatter no more!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It fits any size pan and really stops most of the spatter. My care giver cooks a 2 egg 4 bacon slice breakfast for me every am and he is very happy with this new screen. It clearly will last as it is built very well and the handle has a good grip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: big and useful
customer_reviews.text: this is was much bigger than i was expecting but that's great! you can use it on multiple different sizes of pots and pans so it's very versatile. it's thin so it's easily stored and ready for it's next mission of saving your kitchen from annoying splatters that you have to clean later! one less step to worry about after cooking! it's also very easy to clean, i have washed it then put it in the dishwasher and haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: afran23

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: I should have tried it first but I just can’t get past the marks which looks like it was used or stained. It hasn’t been but not sure why it looks like this. Of even has a smell as if it’s been burned. I hate to give a one but no product should come like this. I’m sorry I bought another for a friend before getting this to see this.
customer_reviews.author: thndr17

customer_reviews.title: Much better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: It started to flare (pieces of metal) pretty quick and got burnt spots that are permanent but it hasn’t gotten worse after the initial drawbacks after using it 2-3x a week for several months. It doesn’t stop 99% of oil but it helps.. maybe 85% if you use max heat like I do to sear things. I still have to clean my stove top sometimes but i don’t get splashes of hot oil when I’m cooking. I need to get one I can put in my oven though! I use a Brillo pad to take oil off so it doesn’t burn as quickly
customer_reviews.author: Alex Habes

customer_reviews.title: Turns black easily if it extends over pan above fire
customer_reviews.text: The splatter screen does an amazing job of preventing splatters. Cleaning is a bit difficult as mesh can be damaged if I scrub too hard. My biggest problem is that it turns black really easily when it sits above the fire if it extends over the pan which is easy as it is really big
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mei

customer_reviews.title: It does what it does.... mostly
customer_reviews.text: This thing does a pretty good job of stopping most oil splashes. Micro droplets still always get through, so you end up having to clean the stove anyway, which is not fun. The other reviews are right -- you basically look at this thing wrong and it will discolor. And, it is impossible to clean. That being said, I don't know if there's that much better of an option. This thing has at least made cooking with hot oil safer.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Erstad

customer_reviews.title: Works Exactly As Advertised! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to buy something like this for a long time, and after what seemed like non-stop cleaning of my stove after every meal, I finally went ahead and decided to try this out. After several uses over the last couple of weeks, I can officially saw that this works great! You have to make sure that you are careful and use it the proper way, but the seller communicated with me shortly after buying the proper orientation, so I have had no issues. This has kept my stove so much cleaner than before, and this has already saved me tons of time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SpartanAlto

customer_reviews.title: Very fine mesh - this one really does cut down on splatter
customer_reviews.text: I like the feet on one side to stand it on the counter without getting oil on the counter. A tiny bit of splatter does get through but nowhere near as much as the old one I had from a big box store starting with W. To clean then, just pop them in the dishwasher or wash them however you wash your dishes. They're nice looking, too. Fit the pans well. When you use it, you set it on the pan with the feet pointing UP.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Person

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out Design--Fits Pans Smaller Than 13" As Well
customer_reviews.text: This grease splatter screen is great! While the description says it's for a 13" frying pan, you can use it on smaller pans as well by simply positioning its center over the smaller pans. What I like best, aside from grease jumping out of the pan onto the stove top and my arms is that it has three small feet on one side, making it so you can take it off the pan, grease and all, turn it over and set it on the feet. This keeps grease from smudging the counter top. Really a well done product.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems very good. Sturdy. Works well. Love that it's dishwasher safe. only thing I would say is that if you use it with a pan that's smaller than the screen, it darkens and looks "burnt" where the screen hangs over the edge of the pan. That doesn't detract from the function. To me, that's not a deal-breaker since the screen works well otherwise to keep my stove (or me) from getting splattered - I didn't really buy it for the "looks".
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: MUST BE THE SAME SIZE AS YOUR PAN
customer_reviews.text: MINE BURNT THE FIRST USE. FRIED SOME CHICKEN AND THE FLAME WAS NOT OUTSIDE OF THE UNDERSIDE OF THE PAN. GREASE STILL ESCAPES BUT JUST LANDS ON THE STOVE INSTEAD OF POPPING OUT OF THE PAN IN AN UPWARD MOTION. JUST SUPPRESSES THE AREA OF THE GREASE TO THE LIP OF THE STOVE.
customer_reviews.author: BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and pretty disappointed. I bought this one because it was supposed to be much better than the cheap ones. Got it and it really looks like it has been bumped around. You can tell things have been pressed into it leaving dents in the screen. There is also black marks (either paint or stressed metal) on the wire frame. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: trentonkerr

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I haven’t had any grease come through the mesh, and like others have stated, a little grease escapes only when you lift it to turn meat etc. It’s sturdy, does the job and is definitely worth the purchase. It has cut down the dreaded stove top cleaning. My only complaint is it’s not the easiest to clean if you have to hand wash your dishes. It would be perfect for someone with a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Cuesta Verde

customer_reviews.title: Good grease guard
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully we saw that there are 2 sides to this so we knew which way was up when we got it. This is our 3rd grease guard in 5 years or so after cooking one int he oven and destroying another. It has a good weight to it and fits our large cast iron skillet. It's not 100% splatter proof but like other reviewers it's about 80-90% effective. I do like that it has the legs on it to keep it off the counter even if I have to look at for a few seconds to make sure I put the right side up on the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie_0384

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily and impossible to full clean.
customer_reviews.text: This item became permanently stained the first time we used it. These stains were right off the center of the screen. Tried a number of times to get the black of with no success. I’m disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Best splatter screen you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the type of splatter screen I bought several months ago, this one is outstanding. Are there oil splatters on my cooktop? Yes, but not many. Was the diameter of the screen too big for the pot, allowing parts of it to get burn marks? Yes; but that was my fault. I’m still happy with it and will order a smaller size. Oh, and it’s easy to cleans AND it doesn’t smell like last night’s dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product if used properly!
customer_reviews.text: This splatter screen is a time/elbow grease saver. Nice and sturdy and effective. There is a pan side, the flat screen side, which just rests on top of your pan, and a counter rest side, with the curved wire supports and feet to keep the dirty screen up off the counter. I just give it a quick scrub, rinse, and dry and it's back in the drawer ready for the next use. A great house warming gift!
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: When I tried using it I had very little splatter and cleaned the screen easily. I hope it holds up with a long ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the screen was very well made. When I tried using it I had very little splatter and cleaned the screen easily. I hope it holds up with a long service life. So far I'm very pleased. I'd like to see your company make a wide range of sizes for pots and pans that didn't come with a lid. I've tried using an oversize lid or splatter screen to cover a small skillet and found them very unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Janni

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent the money
customer_reviews.text: Normally I use a spatter screen to drain the grease off when I cook up a lb. or so of hamburger in a fry pan. I use it less as a "splatter screen". And I usually buy a cheaper version. But in this case those supports across the screen have made all the difference. The whole tool is sturdier and I have no doubt it will last alot longer and do a far better job than the cheaper versions I've been buying. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Really did reduce the splatter - as in NO SPLATTER!
customer_reviews.text: While visiting family I saw our hostess using a splatter screen while cooking bacon. I instantly ordered this one on Amazon as she cooked breakfast. It was waiting at home when we returned from vacation. The next day, we made bacon and use the splatter screen. I am not kidding - NO GREASE SPLATTER. No major stove cleanup after cooking. Cleaning of the splatter screen was easy. Not sure why I never looked for this before!
customer_reviews.author: alongwaysaway

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make steaks in the frying pan on you your stove top you have 2 choices: either cover the pan with a lid and let all that steam trapped inside ruin your steak or clean up splatter all over the kitchen afterwards. With this thing you don't have to choose any more. Love this product. It still traps just a bit of steam in the pan but I consider this really minor issue. Would've given it 4.5 stars if I had this option.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Makarov

customer_reviews.title: Burned.... does the the job though.
customer_reviews.text: Mine burned somehow .... the edges are dark now after using it three times. If it wasn’t for that I’d give it more stars as it actually does the job but I can’t imagine how it’ll look 2 months from now.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie P

customer_reviews.title: Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on the physical quality of the product, I will update regarding performance once I put some "mileage" on the product. I received the screen promptly, and upon opening I was instantly pleased with the build quality of the product. It feels like a quality product and not cheaply built. The handle is plastic but it has a nice rubberized finish to it. The screen has feet built into it and doubled as a cooling rack, which is nice. The jabbed can also be used to hang the screen and save precious space. I give the initial build quality a 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: JoshDole04

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This splatter shield works fantastic. It is large enough for pretty much any pot or pan one would use and it Stops hot grease from spraying all over everything and still allowing you to pick it up cool to the touch. I havent tried it but you could probably use it as a siv for flower or any powders if needed. It is pretty sturdy and easy to clean with a sponge or soft bristled brush with degreasing soap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Reduces grease
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall build of this screen, great quality and holds up well after running it through dish washer all the time. What I don’t like is the grease still splashes, not as much as without the screen, but It was more than I expected. So, as long as you know what to expect (that is you still have to clean the stovetop), it’s a good addition to have around the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, but not more effective
customer_reviews.text: My impressions of the product: Pros: * sturdy construction, quality chrome plating * the little "feet" do keep the screen off of counter or stove surfaces * fits in the dishwasher, with a little persuasion Con - it is no more effective at preventing grease spatters than cheaper screens that use the same mesh size. What you are buying is durability, not improved effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it except that the side that goes down on the pan needs some sort of short guide pegs, perhaps three would do, to keep the lid aligned with the pan. I bought the one for 9.5 inch pans and it fits almost exact, but being flat can move and leave small arcs uncovered. If it had 3 small, short guides angling out, it would keep centered on the pan.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Careful NOT to let the screen touch hot pans
customer_reviews.text: First time out, frying a little bacon, and the intense heat discolored the mesh. I found out it was because it was upside down, touching the cast iron siding. OK, my bad. BUT then, when I used it correctly, the mesh still discolored from the heat. And it doesn't wash out. It does the trick, but I wonder how long it will last before it's a burnt patterns become the Rorschach test...
customer_reviews.author: Rahul G. Sabnis

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for the cheap splatter screens!
customer_reviews.text: This splatter screen is awesome. It's sturdy, you are not pushing out the screen when you're cleaning it form the wonderful goodness you were cooking. The handle support that goes across the whole screen adds to the sturdiness of the screen, and is a resting point while cooking. Originally bought the large screen which was massive. Returned for the medium when is perfect for family cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D.

customer_reviews.title: Reduces oil splatter - just don't expect it to get it all (or even most)
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few months I would say that, while it definitely reduces oil splatter compared to not using anything, it didn't reduce it enough to my expectations. if I had to put a number on it, I would say that it only reduces by 60 to 70%. Maybe that's good enough for most people and my expectations were too high, but I thought it would be closer to 80 to 90%. Also, Fakespot has a ratings grade of D, so most of these ratings are dubious so I wouldn't trust the 4.5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Wave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but brown stains
customer_reviews.text: This works well to block the splatter but just after 2 uses I can’t seem to clean the brown burn marks off. The mesh is very sturdy and double layered so when using a bristled brush to clean the bristles get stuck so a sponge is what I’ve been using.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Burns and looks stained after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I like that the splatter guard stops the grease from splattering but even that has some issues. It does not stop all grease splatter. I also do not like the discoloration of the item after one use. It does not seem very heat resistant because the handle gets hot when it is left on the pot to prevent grease splatter and I believe the heat has caused mines to change colors. I will upload pics
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tiagha

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I now have both sizes of these screens. They are VERY well made, sturdy, and have an excellent design with the "legs" you can rest on your counter without producing a mess . Shipper as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meridoc

customer_reviews.title: Keep your clothes clean and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This does one job and it does it super well...it keeps grease from splattering out of your pan while cooking...and it does a great job of it. I learned the hard way by cooking without this and unfortunately ruined a shirt and pants, so I knew I had to do something. I searched amazon for a splatter guard and sure enough.... found this! If you want to keep your clothes clean, buy this now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: Roseann Avila

customer_reviews.title: Great but once burnt it'll stay marked

customer_reviews.author: Jae

I think this one will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and haven't had a chance to use it. However, I was delighted to throw away the splash guards that this replaced. I also like that it takes the place of the old set of three different sizes. Takes up less space in the cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: easyrv

customer_reviews.title: Burnable (by gas range
customer_reviews.text: I needed one of these forever and while I like the construction of this one, I didn't realize that a gas range would cause it to burn very easily. Not sure this is a product defect, just sharing my experience. Also ramps up the heat on whatever is in the pan, so while it does cover spatter there are other things you have to think about when using.
customer_reviews.author: minouche

It even has a lifetime warranty and they included a discount coupon toward the purchase of another of their products. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: NiteCat

customer_reviews.title: Stops all splatter while on pan.

customer_reviews.author: IMA49ER

customer_reviews.title: Well made

I highly recommend this excellent product, wish I had looked for a larger one earlier, buy it, you won't be disappointed.

customer_reviews.author: Bama Mama

I would say this screen blocks about 90% of the grease splatter, so that afterwards you only have to do a quick wipe of the stove top surface to clean the little bit of splatter that got through. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
